definition: a heavy iron lever with one end forged into a wedge, be nosey
details:
noun
- a heavy iron lever with one end forged into a wedge
= synonyms: crowbar
verb
- be nosey
= example: be nosey
- to move or force, especially in an effort to get something open
= example: to move or force, especially in an effort to get something open
= synonyms: prize
- make an uninvited or presumptuous inquiry
= synonyms: prise
- search or inquire in a meddlesome way
= synonyms: poke
